docs.lead_paragraph: Heavy turnover and sharply higher rates for the Australian, Swiss and British currencies dominated the foreign exchange market last week. The-only exception to this forward trend was found in the Canadian dollar which was less active and at a decline.

docs.snippet: LAKE SUCCESS, Dec. 19--The United Nations has taken steps to speed the activation of the new fourteen-member Peace Observation Commission set up by the General Assembly to go to trouble areas and report on threats to the peace.
docs.lead_paragraph: LAKE SUCCESS, Dec. 19--The United Nations has taken steps to speed the activation of the new fourteen-member Peace Observation Commission set up by the General Assembly to go to trouble areas and report on threats to the peace.

docs.snippet: The Uruguayan peso rose 3 cents on the foreign exchange market yesterday in a sharp advance attributed by traders to a flight of capital from European centers, principally in Switzerland, Belgium and the Netherlands.
